name: Zenga
description:
Zenga is a hyper casual game featuring a beautiful and relaxing ambience. Build a tower using Jenga-bricks and try to place them as accurately as possible! The games difficulty is balenced to provide a small challenge for a more relaxed playthrough rather then to really test the skills of the player. The beautiful Japanese-Styled LoFi-Soundtrack has been thoughtfully created by Haave. Thanks for shifting the game to a new level! ;) Don't forget to check him out on Spotify!

Enjoy everybody!
